thread.title: World Emoji Day quiz: can you guess the cities?
thread.title_full: World Emoji Day quiz: can you guess the cities? - Telegraph

author: Hugh Morris
title: World Emoji Day quiz: can you guess the cities?
text: To celebrate World Emoji Day (yes, we know it's not a real thing), we've compiled a quiz to test your lateral - and phonetic - thinking as well as your knowledge of the world's cities (NB: there's also one country in there and one county). Some are more straightforward than others, so we've included a hint with each question. Answers at the bottom of the page. No cheating. 1. Hint: Where furcoats reign 2. Hint: The guy on the right could be a relative 3. Hint: That hamster might get the munchies here 4. Hint: Its bridges are much more quaint 5. Hint: A city state, really 6. Hint: That chap on the right is exclaiming 'oh' 7. Hint: Where Magpies live 8. Hint: This one's easy 9. Hint: Is that a house share? 10. Hint: What are they waiting for? 11. Hint: That running man has picked up some serious speed 12. Hint: Not much use for that van in this city 13. Hint: Spanish angels 14. Hint: Think hideout 15. Hint: Too hot for Father Christmas here 16. Hint: This one's a county 17. Hint: What does water from a tap run into? 18. Hint: A farewell from your biggest fan 19. Hint: A city for the adventurous Answers 1. Moscow 2. Baghdad 3. Amsterdam 4. Cambridge 5. Singapore 6. Tokyo 7. Newcastle 8. Bath 9. Stockholm 10. Cuba 11. Belfast 12. Venice 13. Los Angeles 14. Dresden 15. Santa Cruz 16. Cornwall 17. Helsinki 18. Mumbai 19. Tehran Follow @telegraphtravel
